text: That was a cute outfit, wasn't it!

It really suited Rinze well.
The bun hairstyle was perfect too.

Compared to your usual style,
you looked a bit more childlike.
So, borrowing the power of such outfits...

During the recording of the kids' show,
it might be nice to revisit your childhood.

Yeah, just imagine you're a kid again,
simply aiming to have fun.
...No need to overthink it, it'll be fine.
